#Text=England :
#Text=Multi-storey carpark in Liverpool gutted by fire , 1,300 vehicles destroyed
#Text=Thursday , January 4 , 2018
#Text=Merseyside Fire and Rescue Service vehicle .
#Text=Image : John Bradley .

#Text=A fire on Sunday night in the seven-storey carpark for the Echo Arena in Liverpool , England destroyed almost all the vehicles parked inside and led to cancellation of the final evening of the Liverpool International Horse Show and evacuation of nearby blocks of flats .
#Text=The blaze reportedly started with a parked Range Rover Discovery .
#Text=Location of Liverpool within the United Kingdom
#Text=Investigators with the fire brigade stated that they believe the fire began with an accidental engine fire in the Range Rover at about 4.30 pm .
#Text=The first call was made at 4.42 and firefighters arrived eight minutes after that .
#Text=Ultimately twelve engines and 85 firefighters were involved in combatting the blaze .
#Text=Aerial appliances were used and also three high-volume pumps .
#Text=Fed by the fuel in vehicles parked inside , the temperature of the fire in the carpark is believed to have reached as high as 1,000 °C .

#Text=It was too hot to be extinguished with water from hydrants , so a high-volume pump was used to draw water from the River Mersey , and two more were brought from other fire brigades in the region .
#Text=The carpark has seven storeys and a capacity of 1,600 vehicles , and approximately 1,300 were parked in it when the fire broke out .
#Text=According to Dan Stephens , chief fire officer for Merseyside Fire and Rescue Service , almost all of them were destroyed , with the exception of a few parked on the top level and at corners .
#Text=" With these very high temperatures , you were never going to put the fire out without the whole building taking hold .
#Text=Nearby blocks of flats were evacuated because of the smoke .
#Text=Eyewitnesses reported hearing what they at first thought were firecrackers , then " multiple explosions " , " bangs and popping " , " the bangs of car windows exploding " .
#Text=People reported leaving everything in their cars , including their cellphones , and running for their lives .
#Text=Mayor Anderson tweeted that cuts to fire services over the last two years made it significantly harder to fight the fire and might have caused it not to be controllable .

#Text=He also suggested that fire safety in multi-storey carparks had not been sufficiently considered and that installing sprinklers in them might help stop future fires before they become unmanageable , in a letter to Nick Hurd , a member of Parliament .
